report.title: Species counts league for event
report.description: An event (date and survey) filtered league table of taxon counts by warehouse user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND snf.recorders IS NOT NULL

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
